TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed CalendarAlgorithmType extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies whether a calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or lunisolar-based.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A date calculation for a particular calendar depends on whether the calendar is solar-based, lunar-based, or lunisolar-based. For example, the <xref:System.Globalization.GregorianCalendar>, <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseCalendar>, and <xref:System.Globalization.JulianCalendar> classes are solar-based, the <xref:System.Globalization.HijriCalendar> and <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar> classes are lunar-based,.and the <xref:System.Globalization.HebrewCalendar> and <xref:System.Globalization.JapaneseLunisolarCalendar> classes are lunisolar-based, thus using solar calculations for the year and lunar calculations for the month and day.
A CalendarAlgorithmType value, which is returned by a calendar member such as the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property, specifies the foundation for a particular calendar.
## Examples The following code example demonstrates the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.AlgorithmType%2A> property and the CalendarAlgorithmType enumeration.
[!code-cpp[sys.glob.calendartype#1](~/add/codesnippet/cpp/t-system.globalization.c_3_1.cpp)] [!code-cs[sys.glob.calendartype#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.globalization.c_3_1.cs)] [!code-vb[sys.glob.calendartype#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.globalization.c_3_1.vb)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType LunarCalendar = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType LunisolarCalendar = int32(3)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType SolarCalendar = int32(1)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Globalization.CalendarAlgorithmType Unknown = int32(0)
